attributes.action: For the monarchy to up hold the bill of rights for it’s sovereign people
attributes.additional_details: You the Government are acting unlawful in a lot of the acts and statues you  push on we the people , it’s unconstitutional and an infringement on our natural born rights
attributes.background: We want the Government and the king to up hold our natural  law in the uk under the Magna Carta and the bill of right known as our constitution

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions that call for an action relating to a particular individual, including His Majesty the King.

Petitions also need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We don't know what you mean by "hold our natural law in the uk under the Magna Carta and the bill of right known as our constitution".
